extendedInfo.description: **We are currently investigating reported errors. Please check back later**Use Budget Your Trip's free travel budget application to plan and track your travel and vacation expenses.Categorize your expenses by location and type (i.e. accommodation, food, etc.). See daily averages and total costs and compare actual expenses to planned costs. See http://www.budgetyourtrip.com for more information.

reviews.title: Budget
reviews.comment: I found it useful for budgeting our vacation last year. Helped me keep count to the penny. Not sure why it\'s crashing on other peoples\' phones, because it\'s a pretty basic interface.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: More Trouble Than Its Worth
reviews.comment: Too many problems on ICS! It does not give user access to options overflow menus. I cant navigate b/c it just goes through all my previous actions rather than menus. So it will undo all my changes. It has too many overlay and UI issues on ICS to even be used. Its a headache. Most of the \"Features\" can only be edited online. If I wanted something to use online to organize this-I would go there. This is a mobile app-but not something that I can even use to take on the trip. Uninstalled.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Delete
reviews.comment: Keeps force closing and dragging my phone down.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Doesn\'t work for some smaller cities. I don\'t like that you have to enter in city location before every entry.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: It does not work, and is harder than it seems. Do not get this app...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Crashes all the time on my galaxy
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Crashes everytime I try and use it
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Too much work involved for tracking my expenses. Too repetitive e.g city name etc. Prefer cashbook
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Not unique as it was expected.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Would be a 5 star if u could edit an expense once It\'s entered. Please fix and I will give it all 5!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Horrible ui
reviews.comment: The ui is very painfull to use. Why do i have to say that i\'m in tokyo and using yen for every transaction? That\'s just annoying.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Meh.
reviews.comment: Data entry is clunky, and it prefers to use 1969-1970 no matter what date I enter. Uninstalling.
reviews.author: A Google User
